p: J.C.H., V.H. and N.R.S. planned and designed the study. J.C.H. performed the experiments and analysed the data together with A.V., V.H. and N.R.S. A.R.S. performed network analyses. S.M. performed ABA profiling. J.C.H. wrote the initial draft of the manuscript. J.C.H., A.V., V.H. and N.R.S. edited the manuscript into its final form. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
